Posts.Content: fulloffaith1220 wrote: I am scheduled for a biopsy in the morning.  I am 37 years old and very nervous, as I am sure everyone else is.  I received a copy of my Radiology Report for the spot compression mammogram, and it says, "There is a 1.9x1.9x1.0 cm indistinct oval heterogeneous indeterminate mass in the 6 o'clock prosterior, subareolar position of the right breast."  Could someone tell me what all of this means? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy tommorrow, very nervous fulloffaith1220 Lisa1962
